title: Case Studies | Success Stories | Trusted by world's leading brands
content:
# Case Studies | Success Stories | Trusted by world's leading brands

Our work is our passion, and here are the success stories from all walks of our digital excellence journey. Explore our region-wise, DXP-specific case studies here.


Our work in action We empower brands that provoke interactive experiences, digital boom, and business growth. All Solutions All Solutions B2C B2B Headless Commerce Mobile Commerce Marketplace Omnichannel Digital Marketing All Platforms All Platforms Adobe Commerce Shopify Plus Commercetools Vtex Mirakl VueStoreFront All Industries All Industries Consumer Goods Industrial Goods Food & Beverage Health & Beauty Fashion & Apparel Gems & Jewellery Home Decor Kids & Education Real Estate All Regions All Regions North America Europe Middle East & Africa APAC Middle East & Africa Global Leaders in delivering bottled drinking water with a pleasant taste at an affordable price in more than 20 countries. Solution B2C | Mobile Commerce INDUSTRY Food & Beverage View Case Study North America BioIQ was founded in 2005 in Santa Barbara, CA, with the idea of evolving the way health measurement works. By seamlessly connecting people to health testing through BioIQ’s software, it makes testing more accessible, creates more insight for people and allows more touchpoints with health service partners. Krish was engaged to develop BioIQ’s next-generation portal and associated mobile apps based on Magento’s eCommerce framework. Solution B2C | Mobile Commerce INDUSTRY Health & Beauty View Case Study Europe Stay tuned to read more about the success story of Hamleys' commerce vision. Solution B2C | Digital Marketing INDUSTRY Kids & Education View Case Study Middle East & Africa Laying the Foundation with Robust Digital Solutions Solution B2B INDUSTRY Real Estate View Case Study APAC Established in 2016, Seniority Ltd had been serving their online audience through Magento 1x platform and wanted to build a digital commerce store, which can serve senior citizens with ease in ordering all kind of medical and healthcare products for them. While the brand initially had an online presence through Magento 1x, the increasing footfall with other operational issues raised the need for improved presence.
